name: Oros: Online Card Game
description:
Oros is now on mobiles! Take the classic Moroccan card game from the neighborhood anywhere! Now with new rules, world series tournaments, modes of play, and much more. Whether you’re at home, or on the go, you can play online with different players in the world, not the same friend anymore. Oros has something for everyone in the family. Oros is a fun and memorable family-friendly card game wherever and whenever.

Playing Oros with friends, family, and millions of players worldwide has never been simple! Join one of the largest free online gaming communities and enjoy an all-new free multiplayer experience and competitive leaderboards.

Features
- It is totally FREE to play
